Flow.description: 6/26 AV - Added a dynamic script for the agents to note the reason behind a different residence and dx state per Ops and QC's request. 6/23 AV - Added script for if there is more than one dx. 6/19 AV - Removed the "Kidney transplant prior to dx" question from the injury flow as D&C requested it to be in the "Additional Case Detail" object instead. 6/13 AV- Fixed picklist that was mapped to the wrong field. 6/12 AV - Added clarification to dx state question and changed the button from "Finish" to "Done". 6/11 AV- Moved question, "When did you receive your diagnosis?" up because it should be placed before the recurrence questions. 6/9 AV - When looking into the questionnaire output. Noticed, the deprecated "subtype" field was being mapped here. Fixed that mapping. 6/5 AV - Fixed comp visibility 6/5/ AV - Added new kidney transplant question. 6/2 AV - Fixed "Multi-picklist" label on subtype. 6/2 AV - Remapped subtype. 5/28 RE - Making the isTreated fields required. 5/27 AV - Fixed a filter that was not working for a question. 5/27 AV - Added RU tweaks and visibility changes needed. 5/21 AV - Accidentally added the wrong field in the assignment. Just fixed that and added the correct remission years field. 5/21 AV - Added remission dates per QC's request. 5/12 LP Updated detail question dependancies 5/12 VP Added multi picklist help text Injury Questions to collect answers for Object: srlg_Injury__c 5/14 Removed script placeholder and added new dependent picklist's component.
Flow.label: SRLG | Injury Questions

fields.name: ErrorMessage
fields.fieldText: Hey there, you tried to delete something you weren't supposed to. How ironic.

value.stringValue: What illness were you formally diagnosed with by a medical professional?
Is there a subtype associated with this injury (e.g., Goiter for Thyroid Disease)?

fields.name: MultipleDiagnosesScript
fields.fieldText:
**ONLY READ IF THERE'S MORE THAN 1 DX**

"Thank you for sharing that with me. Just to clarify for our records, do you know if the diagnosis of [qualifying cancer] was separate from the [disqualifying cancer]—meaning it did not spread from or metastasize from the [disqualifying cancer] and was an independent diagnosis?"

Note: If the disqualifying cancer DID spread to the qualifying cancer (and the diagnosis is not independent), this would be a disqualifier. Please turn the file down and add a note.

fields.name: InjuryDiagnosisDate
fields.fieldText: When did you receive your diagnosis?

fields.name: Have_there_been_any_recurrences
fields.fieldText: Have there been any recurrences?

fields.name: If_so_what_is_the_last_date_of_reccurrence
fields.fieldText: If so, what is the last date of reccurrence?

fields.name: InjurySeverity
fields.fieldText: What was the stage at the time of diagnosis?

fields.name: InjuryStateOfDiagnosis
fields.fieldText: In which state were you diagnosed? (Could be different from residence state. For example, client saw an out-of-state specialist, snowbirds)

fields.name: InjuryResidenceStateAtDiagnosis
fields.fieldText: In which state were you living at the time of diagnosis?

fields.name: DifferentResidentAndDxState
fields.fieldText: ﻿If you selected a diagnosis state different from the client’s residence state. Please ask why and briefly note the reason in the notes text field (NOTE: It's the last question in this screen)

fields.name: RemissionCheck
fields.fieldText: Have you been in remission?

fields.name: RemissionStartDate
fields.fieldText: What was your remission start date?

fields.name: YearsInRemission
fields.fieldText: How many years have you been in remission?

fields.name: TreatedWithSurgery1
fields.fieldText: Were you treated with surgery?

fields.name: SurgeryDetails1
fields.fieldText: Please provide any other notes regarding your surgery.

fields.name: TreatedWithChemotherapy
fields.fieldText: Were you treated with chemotherapy?

fields.name: ChemotherapyDetails
fields.fieldText: Please provide any other notes regarding your chemotherapy treatment.

fields.name: TreatedWithRadiation1
fields.fieldText: Were you treated with radiation therapy?

fields.name: RadiationDetails
fields.fieldText: Please provide any other notes regarding your radiation treatment.

fields.name: TreatedWithImmunotherapy
fields.fieldText: Were you treated with immunotherapy?

fields.name: InjuryNotes
fields.fieldText: Is there any additional information or notes regarding this injury?
